item.title: Secure Code Review 01 - Hash Length Extension Attack
item.description: Introduction # Welcome to the secure code review series, where we take a closer look at different types of code and evaluate them based on potential security vulnerabilities.

item.title: Secure Code Review 02 - Path Traversal Bugs
item.description: Introduction # In the second part of the secure code review series, we look at path traversal bugs.
